platform.name: SetSail BizAccel
platform.description: SetSail BizAccel is the official business accelerator of President University. It serves as a university-based incubation and acceleration platform designed to build an entrepreneurial ecosystem for students.

vision.statement: Building an entrepreneurial ecosystem for the next generation of innovators.

mission.statement: Empowering tomorrow’s leaders by transforming students into entrepreneurs.
details: Encouraging students to build companies while studying
Embedding entrepreneurship programs into the university curriculum
Changing students’ mindset from job seekers to business creators

recognition.achievement: #1 in the World for Entrepreneurial Spirit
recognition.note: Recognized globally for excellence in entrepreneurial education
